docs.lead_paragraph: To the Editor of the New-York Times: The remarks in your paper of Oct. 28, about the delinquencies of farmers, sets out upon a somewhat ex paric view, and overlooks a point or two that, in justice to that class of tollers, might be liberally admitted. In the first place, nobody but a city editor could suppose a farm to be a "region of eternal abundance, innocence and quiet."

docs.lead_paragraph: The Washington Star, of Tuesday, says: "President Buchanan was walking on the Avenue yesterday afternoon, as blustering as the weather was, without even the protection of an overcoal. We never saw him look in better health, or move with more elasticity of step."

headline.main: LAW INTELLIGENCE.; SUPREME COURT. THE NEW-YORK HOTEL SCANDAL. Did the Act Prove Insanity ?--The Proceedings on the Habeas Corpus. UNITED STATES COMMISSIONERS COURT. UNITED STATES CIRCUIT COURT.--OCT. 28. SUPREME COURT - GENERAL TERM,- OCT 30. PRACTICE-FOREIGN ATTACHMENT--ORDER OF A JUDGE NEEDED IN ALL CASES. UNITED STATES DISTRICT COURT.

docs.lead_paragraph: Before Hon. Justice Roosevelt. In the maller of the petition of Caroline Wood-man.--Some time since there was published in the TIMES an account of a scandalous affair at the New-York Hotel. Mr. Woodman, a boarder there, returning suddenly to his room, one evening, discovered his wife and a Mr. Gardner Furniss, together under decidedly suspicious circumstances.
docs.abstract: Investigation of the charge of Insanity

headline.main: THREE DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; Consols 88 1-2 a 88 3-4. DECLINE IN COTTON...BREADSTUFFS QUIET. Financial Panic in Hamburg, Holland, Belgium, Vienna and Portugal. Interesting Details of the Last Indian News. AMERICAN STOCKS ACTIVE. THREE DAYS LATER FROM EUROP ARRIVAL OF THE PERSIA. Further Shipments of Specie for the United States. $1,200,000 in Specie Arrived. Improved Tone in the London Money Market.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Cunard steamship Persia, Capt. JUDKINS, which sailed from Liverpool at about 9 o'clock on the morning of Saturday the 17th October, arrived at this port yesterday morning, bringing $1,200,000 specie. The following is the specie list per Persia:
docs.abstract: His horse Belle wins a race at New Market
